topic.title: LAK SFR CNC: Specify Stream Transport Observations

para.text: LAK SFR CNC: Specify Stream Transport Observations
Edit each Stream in the Object Properties dialog box and specify stream transport observations of concentration.

image.title: Screen capture of the Object Properties dialog box illustrating the specification of stream transport observations.
